name: Star Butterfly·Dawn
description: You are the first sunlight, you are the awakening dream, you are the flying Star Butterfly on stage.

name: Star Butterfly·Lyrics
description: You are the cloud, you are the lullaby, you are the flying Star Butterfly on stage.

name: Star Butterfly·Melody
description: You are the wind, you are the wildfire, you are the flying Star Butterfly on stage.

name: Star Butterfly·String
description: You are the moonlight, you are the ocean, you are the flying Star Butterfly on stage.

name: Star Crumb
description: Cluster of Stars Hanging in the Sky. Being a very rare item, it can be used to make high-end headwear.

name: Star Hat Shard
description: Shard of the legendary artifact: Hat of the Star God. A shard left on the battleground of gods. Collect materials and shards and go to Miss Futraca to restore it to its former glory!

name: Star Marina [1]
description: Miss Marina is very mysterious. She never talks with others, she just gazes at the surface as if waiting for something. “I wonder if a star will fall today...”

name: Star Musician·Dawn
description: Every key on the keyboard is the sound belongs to you. Everyone on the world has a song belongs to oneself.

name: Star Musician·Lyrics
description: Every key on the keyboard is the sound belongs to you. Everyone on the world has a song belongs to oneself.

name: Star Musician·Melody
description: Every key on the keyboard is the sound belongs to you. Everyone on the world has a song belongs to oneself.

name: Star Musician·String
description: Every key on the keyboard is the sound belongs to you. Everyone on the world has a song belongs to oneself.

name: Star Ring
description: The pure and impeccable jewel mirrored the starlight, as if telling a wordless promise.

name: Star Singer·Dawn
description: It does not need a reason to love music. To be a musician because of love, to be a guardian because of love, to be a singer because of love!

name: Star Singer·Lyrics
description: It does not need a reason to love music. To be a musician because of love, to be a guardian because of love, to be a singer because of love!

name: Star Singer·Melody
description: It does not need a reason to love music. To be a musician because of love, to be a guardian because of love, to be a singer because of love!

name: Star Singer·String
description: It does not need a reason to love music. To be a musician because of love, to be a guardian because of love, to be a singer because of love!

name: Star White Crown
description: Picking up cold stars in the night sky, Mallimei, the god of cloud, Mixed platinum and starlight to create a flawless star white crown for her daughter. Wearing this crown, the cloud fairy married the Elf King and bought a new life at the doomsday. Her feats are remembered by the elves, and she is also known as the fairy of star.
